Metadata.name: Auto Heal
Metadata.author: SCArkadia
Metadata.description:
You don't want to keep pressing main menu and use healing skills? You don't have healing skills to heal HP?
This mod is for you. This is a Quality of Life mod that will auto heal your HP to full as long as you have enough SP.
SP Formula if you are interested:
HPtoHeal = ((TotalHP-CurrentHP)/ 2 * 0.35) + 6 SPlost= CurrentSP-HPtoHeal
In case if SP is not enough to full heal:
SPlost = CurrentHP + ( CurrentSP * 4 );
Just for Yukiko's Dungeon (Since it is very early game and may not have enough SP item to get), the following formula is:
HPtoHeal = (TotalHP-CurrentHP)/ 2 * 0.25 SPlost= CurrentSP-HPtoHeal
In case if SP is not enough to full heal:
SPlost = CurrentHP + ( CurrentSP * 4 );
Note: This mod also blocks the Half SP Cut in Hollow Forest, making the penalty every after battle not punishing.
